law.catch_line: Reinstatement of certificate of authority -- Fine.
law.text: The certificate of authority of an insurer may be reinstated by the commissioner pursuant to KRS 304.3-180 if the request for reinstatement is accompanied by a fine in the amount of one thousand dollars ($1,000).
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 21, effective July 12, 2012.
